thread.title: Community works together to rebuild Richmond park
thread.title_full: Community works together to rebuild Richmond park - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Emily Green
title: Community works together to rebuild Richmond park
text:
Photo: Paul Chinn, The Chronicle Ashwini Palikhe, 5, tries out the new exercise equipment while volunteers rebuild and refurbish John F. Kennedy Park behind her in Richmond, Calif. on Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015. Ashwini Palikhe, 5, tries out the new exercise equipment while...
By 9:30 Saturday morning, nearly 400 people had shown up to John F. Kennedy Park in Richmond, ready to transform it from a drug and alcohol haven for homeless people to a destination park with a technology center, outdoor gym machines, a fitness trail and a new playground. Ashwini Palikhe, 5, tries out the new exercise equipment while volunteers rebuild and refurbish John F. Kennedy Park behind her in Richmond, Calif. on Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015. Ashwini Palikhe, 5, tries out the new exercise equipment while...
By 9:30 Saturday morning, nearly 400 people had shown up to John F. Kennedy Park in Richmond, ready to transform it from a drug and alcohol haven for homeless people to a destination park with a technology center, outdoor gym machines, a fitness trail and a new playground.
